Available Classes¶

class pyoptools.misc.Poly2D.poly2d¶

Class to define a 2D polynomial .. math:: z=c0+ c1*x+c2*y+ c3*x^2+c4*x*y+c5*y^2+ c6*x^3+c7*x^2*y+c8*x*y^2+c9*y^3+...
